Hydras:

Hidras laughted and took glenty her chin and said "As usual... Wise 
and loyal, what would I do without ya????  Go my dear, and crush him 
for me after find out how it can be, I guess that it's a sort of 
clone, it wasn't the first time that this happen... Peceptor, follow 
her..."And kissed her, after he finished his kiss said "Go my dear 
and  mortal lady, have fun, crushing him after that give your 
report... close the door, when you go out,I need... privacy and I 
don't like that all know that I have this little toy... "

Perceptor, walked to the exit.

Hydras sat don't and re-took the control of the Puppet

as

puppet ad

leader... 
> > Find out my dear what doeas he pretends... WHIL I CRUSH THAT 
FALSE 
> > BOT THAT PRETEND TO BE ME!!! "
> > 
> 
> Grabbing his arm, "WAIT! Would not be wise!" pausing awaiting his 
reaction. 
> 
> "Allow me to go. Perhaps he is not aware of your presence & who 
you are. If 
> he is who he claims.. he would recognise who I am." Her voice 
stern & as 
> logical as possible. Hydras was playing a dangerous enough game 
with Vykos. Another 
> challenger made it all the worse. 
> But she was bound & determined that the one in Leadership would be 
the one 
> she trusted most.. the one was TRULY Megatron. & Hydras was he. 
> 
> Gazing up at Hydras with her crimson optics.. attempting to 
convince him.
